summary: Self-taught Full-Stack Software Engineer with demonstrated expertise in building and deploying scalable web applications and AI-powered systems. Completed intensive 18-month ALX Software Engineering program with exceptional performance (106.76%). Proven track record of developing production-ready applications with modern technologies including Python, JavaScript, React, and cloud deployment platforms. Strong background in API development, database design, and DevOps practices. Committed to continuous learning and excellence in software development.
